text: tweak coming to the design manager’s active tab in the tab bar, this change will make it more obvious which tab is currently active.(I’ve gotten complaints that it wasn’t immediately obvious)
will try to get these improvements into the beta soon so hopefully I can release all the updates to stable as a xmas gift :wink:
Man, someone on the design manager team is trying to create work for me over the holidays lol. they made a change that breaks the developer menu. I will try to get it fixed soon as possible.
